bibliography:
Alexander, S., 1921, ‘Some Explanations’ Mind,
30(120): 409–28.

Aristotle, Physics, translated by Robin Waterfield with an
introduction by David Bostock, Oxford: Oxford World’s Classics,
1996.

Baltzly, D., 2003, ‘Stoic Pantheism,’ Sophia,
42(2): 3–34.

Bishop, J. and Perszyk, K., 2017, ‘The Divine Attributes
and Non-Personal Conceptions of God,’ Topoi,
36(4): 609–21.

Bosanquet, B., 1913, The Value and Destiny of the
Individual, London: Macmillan.

Bruno, G., 1584, Cause, Principle and Unity, edited and

University Press, 1998.

Buckareff, A.A. and Nagasawa, Y. (eds.), 2016, Alternative

Oxford University Press.

Byerly, T.R., 2019, ‘The Awe-some Argument for
Pantheism,’ European Journal for Philosophy of

Byron, 1854, Life of Lord Byron, with his Letters and

Caird, E., 1892, ‘Metaphysic’ in Encyclopaedia

Caird, J., 1880, ‘Corporate Immortality’ in Scotch

Chittick, W., 1989, The Sufi Path of Knowledge: Ibn

Coleridge, S.T., 1839, ‘Notes on Waterland’s Vindication

Dawkins, R., 2007, The God Delusion, London: Black
Swan.

Einstein, A., 2010, The Ultimate Quotable Einstein, edited

Eriugena, John Scottus, Periphyseon, On the Division of
Nature, translated by Myra L.Uhlfelder, Indianapolis:

Fechner, G., 1946, Religion of a Scientist, selections from

Harrelson, K.J., 2009, The Ontological argument from Descartes

Harrison, P., 2013, Elements of Pantheism; Religious reverence

Hegel, G.W.F., 1821, Philosophy of Right, translated

Hewitt, S., 2019, ‘God Is Not a Person (An Argument via

Holland, A., 1997, ‘Fortitude and Tragedy: the Prospects for a

Hoque, M. A., 2014, ‘Pantheism in Wordsworth: A Study from

Illingworth, J.R., 1898, Divine Immanence, London:

Kahn, C.H., 1960, Anaximander and the Origins of Greek

Levine, M.P., 1994, Pantheism; A non-theistic concept of

Mander, W. J., 2000, ‘Omniscience and Pantheism,’

Mander, W.J., 2007, ‘Theism, Pantheism and Petitionary

Moran, D., 1990, ‘Pantheism from John Scottus Eriugena to

Næss, A., 1973, ‘The Shallow and the Deep, Long-Range

Oakes, R., 2006, ‘Divine Omnipresence and Maximal Immanence:

Otto, R., 1917, The Idea of the Holy, Oxford: Oxford

Royce, J., 1906, The Conception of Immortality, London:

Schelling, F.W.J., 1810, ‘Stuttgarten

Schopenhauer, A., 1839, On the Basis of Morality,

Sprigge, T.L.S., 2006, The God of Metaphysics, Oxford:
